48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:The Prophet said: “There is nothing more honorable with Allah [Most High] than supplication.”

chapter.ara-name: بَاب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الدُّعَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtue OF The Supplication
